publications.title: DCAN: DenseNet with Channel Attention Network for Super-resolution of Wireless Capsule Endoscopy
publications.authors: H Vaghela, A Sarvaiya, P Premlani, A Agarwal, K Upla, K Raja, ...
publications.journal: 2023 11th European Workshop on Visual Information Processing (EUVIP)
publications.abstract: This paper presents DCAN, a novel DenseNet-based architecture with channel attention mechanism for super-resolution of wireless capsule endoscopy images. The proposed method addresses the challenge of low-resolution images in medical endoscopy by leveraging dense connections and attention mechanisms to enhance image quality while preserving important diagnostic features. Our approach demonstrates significant improvements in both quantitative metrics and visual quality compared to existing super-resolution methods.

publications.title: Channel Attention Network for Wireless Capsule Endoscopy Image Super-Resolution
publications.authors: A Sarvaiya, H Vaghela, K Upla, K Raja, M Pedersen
publications.journal: International Conference on Computer Vision and Image Processing
publications.abstract: This work introduces a channel attention network specifically designed for super-resolution of wireless capsule endoscopy images. The proposed architecture focuses on enhancing the resolution of medical images while maintaining critical diagnostic information through innovative attention mechanisms. The method shows promising results in improving the quality of low-resolution endoscopic images for better clinical diagnosis.
